00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <avr/io.h>
00025 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00026 
00028 #define OCR0_1MS 14
00029 
00033 void init_timer_0(void) {
00034    TCCR0 = 0;
00035    TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE0);         /* enable output compare interrupt */
00036    TCCR0  = (1<<WGM01)|(1<<CS02)|(1<<CS01)|(1<<CS00); /* CTC, prescale = 1024 */
00037    TCNT0  = 0;
00038    OCR0   = OCR0_1MS;                     /* match in aprox 1 ms,  */
00039 }
00040 
00042 void init_timer_2(void) {
00043         TCCR2 = 0;
00044         TCNT2 = 0;
00045         TCCR2 = (1<<WGM21) | (0<<WGM20) | (0<<CS22) | (1<<CS21) | (1<<CS20); //Normal operation, toggle on compare, prescale clk/64     
00046         TIFR |= (1<<OCF2);
00047         OCR2 = 30;      //Will trigger an interrupt each with an interval of 130us
00048         TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE2);
00049 }
00050 
00053 void init_ports(void) {
00054         DDRA = 0x80;
00055         DDRB = 0xF0;
00056         DDRC = 0xFF;
00057         DDRD = 0xF8;
00058         DDRE = 0x00;
00059         DDRF = 0x7F;
00060         DDRG = 0x1C;
00061         
00062         PORTD |= (1<<2);
00063         PORTD |= (1<<3);
00064         
00065         //Activate pullup, for POS/NEG driver module sense input
00066         PORTF = (1<<7);
00067 }
